## ğŸ“ˆ Timeline Example

```
Day 1: Development
â”œâ”€â”€ Feature work
â”œâ”€â”€ Bug fixes
â””â”€â”€ Testing

Day 2: Alpha Release
â”œâ”€â”€ npm run version:alpha â†’ v0.2.0-alpha.1
â”œâ”€â”€ git push origin --tags
â”œâ”€â”€ GitHub Actions builds (~15 min)
â””â”€â”€ Internal testing begins

Day 5: Beta Release
â”œâ”€â”€ Fixes from alpha testing
â”œâ”€â”€ npm run version:beta â†’ v0.2.0-beta.1
â”œâ”€â”€ git push origin --tags
â””â”€â”€ Beta testers notified

Day 10: Stable Release
â”œâ”€â”€ All tests passed
â”œâ”€â”€ npm run version:minor â†’ v0.2.0
â”œâ”€â”€ git push origin --tags
â”œâ”€â”€ Release published
â””â”€â”€ All users auto-update
```
